snippet.title: Globeba - Use your magic to plant helpful tubers and make your way through the handcrafted dungeons!
snippet.description:
Play for free on itch.io https://team-bugulon.itch.io/globeba?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt Your magic tome has been stolen by the weather wizard Ogro! Use your summoning magic to plant helpful tubers and mandrakes to make your way through three handcrafted dungeons. Overcome foe after foe to retrieve what is rightfully yours and reunite with your floral friends!

➡️ More from Team Bugulon https://team-bugulon.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More Zelda-likes https://itch.io/games/tag-zelda?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames
